name: opelopabaf
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wcel(cop(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, w0)), w1)
-| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: The law of concretion. Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. This version of ~ opelopab uses bound-variable hypotheses in place of distinct variable conditions." (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Nov-2016.)
